text: Colin Fyfe Miller (born 4 October 1964) is a Scottish-born Canadian professional soccer coach. He captained the Canadian national team several times while earning 61 caps (scoring 5 goals) in total.Mamrud, Roberto. "Canada - Record International Players". RSSSF, 29 February 2012.
